svg.title: Test conditional processing DOM interface for foreignObject

defs.script: function runtest() { try { var f1 = document.getElementById("f1"); var i0 = f1.systemLanguage.getItem(0); if(i0 != "x") { return; } f1.removeAttribute("systemLanguage"); } catch(e) { var f = document.getElementById("fail"); f.setAttribute("fill", "red"); } }
